channel.title: Server(not 562) PLEASE HELP ME
channel.description: I am using the 614 source and i can run it and connect to it locally, i have port forwarded, i changed the 127.0.0.1 ip to my vps's no-ip thing and the 81.something ip to the no-ip thing, how can i make it so other people can join, i run the server go to http://pk-universe.com/pk/ to download the 614 client and try but it isnt working, does the client need some kind of cache not sure :S
